description: What better way to celebrate the New Year than with this refreshing Red Snapper? The name doesn’t equally define the drink, aside from it being red. This cocktail is an exciting variation of the classic&nbsp;Bloody Mary, with some ingredients that'll make your mouth water in anticipation of a savory experience!
name: Red Snapper

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, horseradish, Tabasco, celery salt, and black pepper in a cocktail shaker.
